MTHH.CO.summary: MT HÃ¸jgaard Holding A/S operates in the construction and civil engineering industry in Denmark, the North Atlantic countries, and internationally. The company develops, constructs, and refurbishes buildings on a main, design-build, or subcontract basis for private and public customers, organizations, and housing associations. It also undertakes infrastructure project, earthwork and piling, marine, and shell construction works. MT HÃ¸jgaard Holding A/S was founded in 1918 and is headquartered in SÃ¸borg, Denmark. MT HÃ¸jgaard Holding A/S is a subsidiary of HÃ¸jgaard Holding A/S.

PAAL-B.CO.summary: Per Aarsleff Holding A/S, together with its subsidiaries, offers building construction and civil engineering services in Denmark and internationally. It operates through three segments: Construction, Pipe Technologies, and Ground Engineering. The Construction segment offers domicile construction, building renovation, and technical contracts, as well as infrastructure projects involving district heating, earthwork, roads, sewers, cables, paving, and railway work. The Pipe Technologies segment offers pipe renewal services. The Ground Engineering segment offers pile driving and foundation work, including sheet pile walls and combi walls, secant pile walls, and diaphragm walls, as well as driven and drilled king post walls. The company was formerly known as Per Aarsleff A/S and changed its name to Per Aarsleff Holding A/S in April 2016. Per Aarsleff Holding A/S was founded in 1947 and is headquartered in Viby J, Denmark.
